short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Give a clean and modern look to your new tab page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1) The extension is a custom Chrome tab extension. 
2) It resets the default search functionality to provide results by Microsoft Bing on the new tab page.
3) The new tab provides a custom search bar with search results from Microsoft Bing.
4) It additionally provides a feature to switch between Microsoft Bing and Yahoo! search results 
5) Set nature related background wallpapers and custom background wallpapers
6) It provides a feature for backup and recovery of the search from the new tab page
7)By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Bligpt TabPage extension and setting Chromeâ„¢ New Tab to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use at [adding link] and Privacy Policy [adding hyper link). The extension will update your search settings and will change your New Tab and it will be provided by Microsoft Bing.
9)BliGpt - New Tab Page Plus wallpapers are all generated by AI without any copyright
Privacy:https://finanenews.com/Privacy%20Policy.html
Simple, beautiful, efficient and stylish.
